name: The Clown (A Masks: A New Generation Playbook)
name_original: The Clown (A Masks: A New Generation Playbook)
description:
Here's the thing about superheroes, and comic books, and, just, wearing a cape in general - they're funny! And I'm not just saying that because I'm using humor as a deflection from my deeper feelings. Hey, uh, you know what, don't worry about that last sentence at all. In a world where the apocalypse comes every year with a special tie-in crossover event, everyone could use a good laugh. So hey, send in the Clown!

The Clown is a playbook by Trevor Murray for the game Masks: A New Generation. It requires that game to play, and can be purchased from Magpie Games here. Hey, what gives - This isn't Trevor's itch account! Nicely spotted, eagle-eyed reader - I'm just holding on to it for him while he gets his act together. If you like Trevor's work, you can see more of it in our Dungeon World playbook collection, Incomplete Adventurer.

Includes a laid-out playbook for use at the table. 

Character illustration by Vincent Leonetti (@vincentasaurus)
